Your lesson on photosynthesis aligns with the 7th‑grade NGSS standards **MS-LS1-5** (Structure and function) and **MS-LS1-6** (Solar energy). The objectives you listed—describing the photosynthetic process and explaining chlorophyll’s role—directly map to those standards, so there are no alignment gaps.

- Add an activity linking MS-LS1-7 (Interdependent relationships in ecosystems) by discussing how photosynthesis supports food webs.
- Include a quick formative poll on students’ confidence (engagement score) to see if any concepts need a brief recap before moving on.
